trans-unit.source: Represents a single view of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示的單一檢視<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> control supports the delete operation.

trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref>目前相關聯的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref>控制項支援基礎資料來源的排序的檢視。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a Select operation after converting it to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection if it is not already one.
trans-unit.target: 選取後將其轉換成作業的結果傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>如果還沒有其中一個集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The result of a Select operation.
trans-unit.target: 選取作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: The result of a Select operation, converted to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection if it was not originally one.
trans-unit.target: 選取作業的結果轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>如果它原本不是其中一個集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The return value is not the correct type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值不是正確的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames*> array of the data-bound control if the data-bound control is a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得第一個項目中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames*>陣列，如果資料繫結控制項的資料繫結控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames*>

trans-unit.source: The first item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames*> array of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control, or an empty string for other data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: 中的第一個項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames*>陣列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項或其他資料繫結控制項為空字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames*>

trans-unit.source: The old values.
trans-unit.target: 舊的值。

trans-unit.target: 插入方法的結果。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the method parameters for model binding, using the data source operation, the data source method object, and the control values.
trans-unit.target: 評估模型繫結，使用資料來源作業、 資料來源方法物件和控制項值的方法參數。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.EvaluateMethodParameters%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod%2CSystem.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload with the `isPageLoadComplete` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.EvaluateMethodParameters%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod%2CSystem.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>多載`isPageLoadComplete`參數設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.EvaluateMethodParameters%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod%2CSystem.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data source operation for which the parameters are being evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源評估參數的作業。

trans-unit.source: The method object for which the parameters are being evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 評估參數的方法物件。

trans-unit.source: The values from the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項中的值。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the method parameters for model binding, using the data source operation, the data source method object, the control values, and a value that indicates whether this method is called in the page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete"></xref> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 評估模型繫結，使用資料來源作業、 資料來源方法物件、 控制項值和值，指出是否在頁面中，會呼叫這個方法的方法參數<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete"></xref>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The data source operation for which the parameters are being evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源評估參數的作業。

trans-unit.source: The method object for which the parameters are being evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 評估參數的方法物件。

trans-unit.source: The values from the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項中的值。

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method is called in the page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete"></xref> event handler, and if it is called to evaluate the select method parameters, and if custom value providers are being used.
trans-unit.target: 設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>頁面中，會呼叫這個方法如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete"></xref>事件處理常式，呼叫它來評估選擇方法參數，以及是否正在使用自訂值提供者。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to identify changes in the custom value providers in order to mark the data-bound control for data binding if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 這讓識別自訂值提供者中的變更，以便將資料繫結，如有必要的資料繫結控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the select method parameters and also determines the options for processing the select result, such as auto paging and sorting behavior.
trans-unit.target: 評估的 select 方法參數，也會決定處理選擇結果，例如自動分頁和排序行為的選項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> for the select operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>選取作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions"></xref> to use for processing the select result once the select operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions"> </xref>用於選取的作業完成之後處理選取的結果。

trans-unit.source: These options are determined in this method and later used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.ProcessSelectMethodResult*> method.
trans-unit.target: 這些選項會決定這個方法中，稍後的使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.ProcessSelectMethodResult*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.ProcessSelectMethodResult*>

trans-unit.source: The information required to invoke the select method.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions"></xref> object to use for processing the select result.These options are determined in an earlier call to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.EvaluateSelectMethodParameters*>.

trans-unit.target: Select 方法結果。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the view state for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object since the time when the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 將變更儲存至檢視狀態的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref>自頁面回傳至伺服器時的時間後的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> view state; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no view state associated with the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其中包含所做的變更<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref>檢視狀態; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>是否有與物件相關聯的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the data source view is marked saves its state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> view state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其中包含所做的變更<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref>檢視狀態，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the server control to track changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: 指示要追蹤其檢視狀態變更的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object to track changes to its view state so that the changes can be stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*> object for the control and persisted across requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: 會導致<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref>物件來追蹤其檢視狀態變更，讓所做的變更可以儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>控制與保存跨相同頁面要求的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>

trans-unit.source: The TrackViewState method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: TrackViewState 方法主要是由控制項開發人員使用。
